about_the_game:
SUMMARY
Youth·Growth·Love
This is a yuri visual novel about several young girls.

STORY
Due to an accident, Mei Yu was temporarily brought back to the village where she spent her childhood.
She didn't think it was a good idea, but... she didn't feel like she had much of a choice.

The places in her memory had faded, unable to recapture the feelings of the past, but some marks seemed to have ingrained themselves deep into her marrow, leaving Mei Yu feeling as though she might never break free.
Yet, whether it was her childhood playmates she met again or the mysteriously encountered visitors, they all seemed to ripple through her once calm heart like a stone thrown into still water...

FEATURE
Two main storylines
Seven endings with multiple branching options
Character illustrations with rich variations
Dozens of illustrations that match the plot


CONTACT
weibo/bilibili：@可食用蓝墨水

name: 交织的印记 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11

short_description: "The Intertwined Imprints" is a yuri visual novel that tells a story about youth, growth, and love. Due to an accident, Mei Yu was temporarily brought back to the village where she spent her childhood. She didn't think it was a good idea, but... she didn't feel like she had much of a choice.
